desc.en: Ningbo Rail Transit is an urban rail transit system serving Ningbo,Zhejiang Province,China.Its first subway line was opened for trial operation on May30,2014.There are five operating lines of Ningbo Rail Transit ,namely Line1,Line2,Line3,Line4 and Line5.The total operating mileage is about 185 Km,with a total of 127 stations.

updateHistory.reason: New template of Ningbo Rail Transit
